title: Investment scams targeting UPI users are surging
body: Scammers are posing as SEBI officials and offering guaranteed high returns on UPI-linked investments. Never share your UPI PIN with anyone claiming to be from a regulator.

title: Fake job offers via WhatsApp on the rise
body: Fraudsters are sending unsolicited work-from-home offers with upfront registration fees. Legitimate employers never ask for money before hiring.

title: Loan app fraud targeting young borrowers
body: Illegal loan apps are using harassment and threats after providing tiny loans at hidden interest rates. Only use RBI-registered NBFCs for personal loans.
